snippet: Bedell Cellars’ 2010 merlot, a highlight of a recent sampling of four of the winery’s releases, may ultimately outshine the 2009.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column reviews merlot and other wines from Bedell Cellars in Cutchogue (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Bedell Cellars’ 2010 merlot, a highlight of a recent sampling of four of the winery’s releases, may ultimately outshine the 2009.

headline.seo: 2010 Merlot a Highlight at Bedell Cellars
headline.main: A Merlot That May Best Its Precursor
headline.print_headline: A Merlot That May Best Its Precursor
